author: rhuijben
msg: Resolve issue #3873 in for copies within a single wc.db (completely) and for
After this patch copying from an origin with multiple layers has the same
effect as applying the same changes as the origin on the copy.
(Before this patch only the top layer was copied for each node, so you
could never revert deletions that were copied below the copy root).
(copy_versioned_dir): When we see an op root, handle the shadowed layers by
(STMT_SELECT_DEPTH_NODE): New query, like STMT_SELECT_BASE_NODE but for
(depth_get_info): New function, like base_get_info but for any specific
(db_op_copy): When copying a delete check if we should really add a
(op_copy_shadowed_layer_txn): New function, reusing existing copy baton.
(test_copy_of_deleted): Remove explanation of what used to fail.
